### 1. Board

#### 1.1 Board Info

Board Name: Raspberry Pi 4B.

SPI Pin: SCLK/MOSI/MISO/CS GPIO11/GPIO10/GPIO9/GPIO8.

GPIO Pin: INT GPIO17.

RESET Pin: RST GPIO 27.

### 2. Install

#### 2.1 Dependencies

Install the necessary dependencies.

```shell
sudo apt-get install libgpiod-dev pkg-config cmake -y
```

#### 2.2 Makefile

Build the project.

```shell
make
```

Install the project and this is optional.

```shell
sudo make install
```

Uninstall the project and this is optional.

```shell
sudo make uninstall
```

#### 2.3 CMake

Build the project.

```shell
mkdir build && cd build 
cmake .. 
make
```

Install the project and this is optional.

```shell
sudo make install
```

Uninstall the project and this is optional.

```shell
sudo make uninstall
```

Test the project and this is optional.

```shell
make test
```

Find the compiled library in CMake. 

```cmake
find_package(pmw3901mb REQUIRED)
```


### 3. PMW3901MB

#### 3.1 Command Instruction

1. Show pmw3901mb chip and driver information.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-i | --information)
   ```

2. Show pmw3901mb help.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-h | --help)
   ```

3. Show pmw3901mb pin connections of the current board.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-p | --port)
   ```

4. Run pmw3901mb register test.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-t reg | --test=reg)
   ```

5. Run pmw3901mb read test, m is the chip height, num is the test times.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-t read | --test=read) [--height=<m>] [--times=<num>]
   ```

6. Run pmw3901mb frame capture test, num is the test times.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-t frame | --test=frame) [--times=<num>]
   ```

7. Run pmw3901mb interrupt test, num is the test times.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-t int | --test=int) [--times=<num>]
   ```

8. Run pmw3901mb read function, m is the chip height, num is the test times.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-e read | --example=read) [--height=<m>] [--times=<num>]
   ```

9. Run pmw3901mb frame capture function, num is the test times.

   ```shell
   pmw3901mb (-e frame | --example=frame) [--times=<num>]
   ```

10. Run pmw3901mb interrupt function, num is the test times.

    ```shell
    pmw3901mb (-e int | --example=int) [--times=<num>]
    ```

#### 3.2 Command Example

```shell
./pmw3901mb -i

pmw3901mb: chip is PixArt Imaging PMW3901MB.
pmw3901mb: manufacturer is PixArt Imaging.
pmw3901mb: interface is SPI.
pmw3901mb: driver version is 1.0.
pmw3901mb: min supply voltage is 1.8V.
pmw3901mb: max supply voltage is 3.6V.
pmw3901mb: max current is 70.00mA.
pmw3901mb: max temperature is 85.0C.
pmw3901mb: min temperature is -40.0C.
```

```shell
./pmw3901mb -p

pmw3901mb: SCK connected to GPIO11(BCM).
pmw3901mb: MISO connected to GPIO9(BCM).
pmw3901mb: MOSI connected to GPIO10(BCM).
pmw3901mb: CS connected to GPIO8(BCM).
pmw3901mb: RESET connected to GPIO27(BCM).
pmw3901mb: INT connected to GPIO17(BCM).
```

```shell
./pmw3901mb -t reg

pmw3901mb: manufacturer is PixArt Imaging.

pmw3901mb: product id 0x49.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_inverse_product_id test.
pmw3901mb: inverse product id 0xB6.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_revison_id test.
pmw3901mb: get revison id 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_motion test.
pmw3901mb: get motion 0x28.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_set_motion test.
pmw3901mb: check motion ok.

pmw3901mb: delta x is 0.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_delta_y test.
pmw3901mb: delta y is 0.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_motion_burst test.
pmw3901mb: motion burst is 0x28.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_squal test.
pmw3901mb: get squal is 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_raw_data_sum test.
pmw3901mb: get raw data sum is 0x01.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_max_raw_data test.
pmw3901mb: get max raw data is 0x04.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_min_raw_data test.
pmw3901mb: get min raw data is 0x01.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_shutter test.
pmw3901mb: get shutter is 0x0384.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_observation test.
pmw3901mb: get observation is 0x3F.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_set_observation test.
pmw3901mb: check observation ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_raw_data_grab test.
pmw3901mb: get grab is 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_set_raw_data_grab test.
pmw3901mb: check grab ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_get_raw_data_grab_status test.
pmw3901mb: get status is 0x00.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_reset test.
pmw3901mb: check reset ok.
pmw3901mb: pmw3901mb_shutdown test.
pmw3901mb: check shutdown ok.
pmw3901mb: finish the register test.
```

```shell

pmw3901mb: raw_average is 0x49.
pmw3901mb: raw_max is 0xFF.
pmw3901mb: raw_min is 0x3E.
pmw3901mb: observation is 0x3F.
pmw3901mb: shutter is 0x0DD8.
pmw3901mb: surface quality is 0x0100.
pmw3901mb: delta_x: -0.426cm delta_y: -0.426cm.
pmw3901mb: raw_average is 0x44.
pmw3901mb: raw_max is 0xFF.
pmw3901mb: raw_min is 0x3E.

pmw3901mb: shutter is 0x0DD8.
pmw3901mb: surface quality is 0x00EC.
pmw3901mb: delta_x: -14.497cm delta_y: 88.476cm.

pmw3901mb: raw_max is 0xFF.
pmw3901mb: raw_min is 0x3E.
pmw3901mb: observation is 0x3F.
```

```shell
./pmw3901mb -h

Usage:
  pmw3901mb (-i | --information)
  pmw3901mb (-h | --help)
  pmw3901mb (-p | --port)
  pmw3901mb (-t reg | --test=reg)
  pmw3901mb (-t read | --test=read) [--height=<m>] [--times=<num>]
  pmw3901mb (-t frame | --test=frame) [--times=<num>]
  pmw3901mb (-t int | --test=int) [--times=<num>]
  pmw3901mb (-e read | --example=read) [--height=<m>] [--times=<num>]
  pmw3901mb (-e frame | --example=frame) [--times=<num>]
  pmw3901mb (-e int | --example=int) [--times=<num>]

Options:
  -e <read | frame | int>, --example=<read | frame | int>
                              Run the driver example.
  -h, --help                  Show the help.
      --height=<m>            Set the chip height in m.([default: 1.0])
  -i, --information           Show the chip information.
  -p, --port                  Display the pin connections of the current board.
  -t <reg | read | frame | int>, --test=<reg | read | frame | int>
                              Run the driver test.
      --times=<num>           Set the running times.([default: 3])
```
